sentences.en: Being an Evil Overlord seems to be a good career choice.
sentences.cn: 魔王似乎是个不错的职业选择.

sentences.en: But the company can be a harsh overlord to its crofters.
sentences.cn: 但是公司对其佃户和工人可以作威作福,苛刻异常.

sentences.en: Currently Zerg has caster units like the Infestor, Queen, Overlord, and Overseer.
sentences.cn: 现在虫族有施法单位,像是感染虫, 女王, 领主和督察.

sentences.en: During that talk he made the first public announcement of my transfer to command of overlord.
sentences.cn: 在他的讲词中,首次公开宣布我调任“统主”指挥.

sentences.en: His overlord will protect his interests.
sentences.cn: 他的宗主会庇护他的利益.

sentences.en: In 829, Egbert became an overlord of all the England.
sentences.cn: 829年, 埃格伯特成了整个英国的最高君主.

sentences.en: Now as street overlord, natural and close to the famous street after another.
sentences.cn: 既然名为街头霸主, 自然和大名鼎鼎的街霸距离不远喽.

sentences.en: The little overlord and tests every product according to the international quality standard manufacture strictly.
sentences.cn: 小霸王每一产品均严格按照国际质量标准制造与测试.

sentences.en: The Overlord cannot move while the ability is active.
sentences.cn: 此技能开启时领主不能移动.

sentences.en: The Overlord does not take kindly to having his property stolen.
sentences.cn: 霸主可不能容忍他的财产被偷取.

sentences.en: This is not the Overlord regulations and outright fraud have done?
sentences.cn: 这不是霸王条例和明目张胆的欺诈行为 吗 ?

sentences.en: Tsavong Lah reported directly to Supreme Overlord Shimrra during his bloody campaign to take the Core.
sentences.cn: 在夺取核心世界的血腥战役中,察疯·拉直接向至尊统帅希姆拉负责.

sentences.en: We really don't want to be the overlords of the Palestinian population.
sentences.cn: 我们真的不想当巴勒斯坦人的主子。

sentences.en: Welcome and join and open up little overlord tomorrows together.
sentences.cn: 欢迎加盟,共同开拓小霸王的明天.

words.tran_cn: 霸王；大君主；最高统治者；封建领主

trans.tran_en: someone with great power over a large number of people, especially in the past
